node.display_long_description:
Must-have bow & arrow action game with state of the art Quest graphics. 

NEW GAME MODE “SIEGE OF HEAVEN” AND QUEST 2 UPGRADES!!!

Battle through the floating castles of medieval fantasy to restore Harmony in Heaven, Purgatory & Hell. Rain down arrows against forsaken souls and angelic creatures that have taken over the afterlife.

Finally a great Roguelite on Quest, excellent great replay value that adapts to the player’s skill level and progress as they play. Three beautiful and mysterious, procedurally generated worlds, with infinite replayability, three epic boss fights, multiple optional areas with great loot.

NEW! Free DLC with gate-defense game mode “Siege of Heaven” with 3 extra maps, 50+ new achievements, and leaderboards - perfect for new players and casual VR enthusiasts and advanced players alike, enjoy VR’s highest-rated bow & arrow mechanics shooting a safe spot in a beautiful environment.

Uses VR to the max and makes the most of Quest & Quest 2.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Version 1.3.11

- Fixed an exploit in Asmodeus’ lair: it's no longer possible to hide behind one of the pillars and cupids defending Asmodeus' horns no longer award points.
- Fixed a problem with drawing the weapon string occurring on some devices

nodes.title: Get ready for The 15 minutes of Fame Tournament!
nodes.body_text:
Now it’s time to start training to be ready when it starts on May 14th.
And it’s really worth it because there will be many prizes, among which the coolest are bHaptics TactSuits!
Patrons of the tournament are: Beardo Benjo, Matteo311, Soul Fox Gaming and SteveKnows.
Follow their youtube channels and our social media for tips and tutorials on how to prepare for the Tournament.
See you on Friday!

nodes.title: We’re ending Season 2 early, Season 3 will start on April 21st.
nodes.body_text:
Our fantastic community helped us spot some issues in high-level play scoring that we felt needed addressing. We wouldn’t want these issues to affect how the game’s played, so we’re ending Season 2 much sooner than originally planned. Season 3 will start soon with proper adjustments.

On April 21st:
- All players will earn experience and ranks for their placement on the leaderboard
- Season 3 will begin with NEW LEADERBOARDS
- Player progress % will be retained between seasons
- Ranks from previous seasons will be rewarded with weapon skins
- High level scoring system will be fixed and rebalanced
  
The time is coming for your final runs and high scores. Now is a good moment to ensure your experience, rewards, and fame!

Stay tuned!

node.reviewDescription:
I own a high end gaming PC and own every major VR release on both Steam and Occulus, and THIS game is holding my attention longer than anything else.

Don’t get me wrong, Half Life: Alex, Boneworks, Pavlov etc are all incredible experiences, but the fact that this humble little archery game is competing with the big dogs speaks for itself.

I have more hours on this game than I do any other VR game that I own. I also own 4 different archery games and this one is by far my favorite.

Three beautiful and mysterious, procedurally generated worlds, with infinite replayability, three epic boss fights, multiple optional areas.
